page.title: 15Games Played in Gt.Broughton
page.content: { The outdoor games we play are mostly played at school. People like to play tennis,rounders and football.The most popular game that I know of is rounders. {Rounders The game rounders is played with four posts,one bowler and two equal teams. One team bats and the other team fields. There are lots of other games such as {skipping, cricket}and{netball}also many other games.Some people play leap frog, hide and seek and block 1.2.3. Tennis can be played with four people but most people play with two.There is a net in the middle,the players hit a ball from one side to then other.
